adDetails: Have mold issues in your home and need a cheaper route to go for the same process, that will pass any clearance test? I have been doing mold remediation for over 12 years, and am offering for a short time mold remediation on the side and can likely beat any estimate you have by 50%. I give free estimates and can walk you through the whole process, I have all my own equipment and provide all materials, if I don't pass I clean and remediate past that point for free until it passes clearance. Feel free to inquire via Email
